table.name: quest_academic
table.comment: Recommender (counselor) Academic Record form fields (excluding essays).

field.name: id
field.comment: Primary key.

field.name: target_contact_id
field.comment: The contact (student) being evaluated. FK to Contact ID.

field.name: source_contact_id
field.comment: The contact (recommender) submitting the evaluation. FK to Contact ID.

field.name: ap_class_1
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: ap_class_2
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: ap_class_3
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: ap_class_4
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: ap_class_5
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: ap_class_6
field.comment: Advanced placement class offered by school.

field.name: gpa_unweighted
field.comment: Student cumulative unweighted GPA.

field.name: gpa_weighted
field.comment: Student cumulative weighted GPA.

field.name: gpa_includes_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses gpa_includes option group values.

field.name: gpa_weighted_max
field.comment: Heighest weighted Grade Point Average (GPA) in class.

field.name: numeric_grade_a
field.comment: Equivalent numeric value for grade A.

field.name: numeric_grade_b
field.comment: Equivalent numeric value for grade B.

field.name: numeric_grade_c
field.comment: Equivalent numeric value for grade C.

field.name: numeric_grade_d
field.comment: Equivalent numeric value for grade D.

field.name: unweighted_rank
field.comment: Cumulative unweighted rank of student.

field.name: class_num_students
field.comment: Total number of students in their class (ranking of... field).

field.name: rank_date_low
field.comment: Cumulative rank and GPA cover period FROM this date (only MMYYYY is significant).

field.name: rank_date_high
field.comment: Cumulative rank and GPA cover period TO this date (only MMYYYY is significant).

field.name: term_type_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses term_type option group values.

field.name: term_type_other
field.comment: Describes term type if Block is selected.

field.name: share_ranking
field.comment: How many students share this cumulative ranking?

field.name: course_choice_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses course_choice option group values.

field.name: college_four_year
field.comment: How many students in graduating class plan to attend four year college?

field.name: college_two_year
field.comment: How many students in graduating class plan to attend two year college?
